name: Death Sentence from the Queen
text: Trigger While a resonator your opponent controls is attacking: Your opponent banish a non-attacking resonator he or she controls. You gain life equal to its DEF. (Pay 2 to put this card into your chant-standby area. You may play this from the next turn if it fulfills Trigger condition and you control magic stones equal or more than its cost.)
set: The Castle of Heaven and the Two Towers
